Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to hotel and motel taxes in Saratoga county and the city of Saratoga Springs
Summary: Relates to hotel and motel taxes in Saratoga county and the city of Saratoga Springs; increases the allowable amount of tax imposed by the county; removes exemptions for properties having less than 4 units; relates to the disposition of tax revenues collected; eliminates an advisory committee.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to hotel and motel taxes in Saratoga county and the city of Saratoga Springs
